staticHero.description: Founded in 2021, FLASH VN is an initiative to enhance digital competency with the goal of bridging the gap in education accessibility in the Mekong Delta region through training and innovative approaches.

journey.title: The First Spark
journey.content: FLASH VN, then known as the FLASH initiative, was born from a small but heartfelt idea from passionate youths wanting to ignite positive change in education through technology. We began by designing digital literacy workshops and simple tools for underserved rural students.

journey.title: Taking Root
journey.content: Encouraged by strong feedback, we expanded our work across the Mekong Delta, collaborating with schools and teachers to co-create more engaging learning experiences. This year also marked our transition into a structured social enterprise with a clear vision.

journey.title: Becoming a Social Enterprise
journey.content: We officially registered as FLASH VN Social Enterprise LLC in July. This change enabled us to receive new funding, find university interns, and collaborate more deeply with nonprofits and educational networks. Our work expanded to include digital literacy training, educational content and toolkits tailored to different learning environments.

journey.title: Reaching Wider Communities
journey.content: With the motto "Building Future-ready Communities", we expanded our focus to serve more diverse groups of learners and educators. We developed innovative, low-tech solutions like the VN-Tiny Board game to teach learners with limited digital access. Through partnerships with schools and organizations, we helped develop grassroots partnerships to promote digital and media literacy.

journey.title: Moving Forward with Purpose
journey.content:
Looking ahead, FLASH VN is committed to:
‚Ä¢ Strengthening digital literacy programs for teachers and high school students
‚Ä¢ Developing inclusive digital competency programs for diverse audiences
‚Ä¢ Co-creating adaptable educational toolkits and lesson models

We believe that meaningful change begins with small steps‚Äîthrough every teacher trained, every learner empowered, and every story shared. Stay here for the journey, growing hand-in-hand with our communities.
